snippet.title: Non-Euclidean 3D Modeling - Hyperbolica Devlog #5
snippet.description:
Modeling 3D geometry for non-euclidean spaces presents some real challenges!  To explain how we accomplished this is the artist himself; João Kalva.  This is the 5th Hyperbolica Devlog and my first video with a guest speaker.  To catch-up from the beginning, you should start here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zQo_S3yNa2w 

Hyperbolica on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1256230/Hyperbolica/
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EMKLeS-Uq_8
Discord Server: https://discord.gg/7fAwnYV
Merch: https://crowdmade.com/collections/codeparade

00:00 - Introduction
00:44 - Horizontal Distortion
01:30 - Vertical Distortion
02:30 - Geometry
03:38 - Color
04:35 - Why Low Poly
04:52 - Conclusion

João Kalva
ArtStation: https://www.artstation.com/joaokalva
YouTube [Portuguese]: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC94uepLm17MVxx05RBFbJgg/videos

If you like the things I do and want to support the channel:
https://www.patreon.com/codeparade
https://ko-fi.com/codeparade

Music By Phil K.
https://willcomposeforfood.com/
